Posts.Content: Apr 22, 2009 02:01PM - edited Apr 22, 2009 02:02PM by luvtotravel In my order of importance: 1  Spend the money and get your will updated.  That way you have a say in where the boys go if something happens to your husband.  The money also won't be tied up in probate. 2. Gather the pictures, dump them in a pile, gather some good friends to sort into boxes for the two boys.  Mark the identify of the people on the back of the pictures  You can sit and lounge and help them with the names.  Order pizza delivery and have fun with it, laughing at the hairstyles and decor etc. 3.  Write just one letter to each boy telling them how much you love them and how proud you are of them. 4,  If you feel like it there a is book called "All about me" that can give the boys some well needed history about your side of the family (medical is esp. important) It is fill in the blank 5.  Hug them and enjoy them every day.
